GetSendDtlDataFromOrder.Sql: select [table].orderid as relid,0 as lineid,[table].orderno as relno,[table].lineid as relmxid,[table].itemno,itemdata.itemname,itemdata.descript, [table].ranks,[table].msunit,[table].qty,[table].price,[table].ordersum,wsp_supply_ordermst.relno as purno,wsp_supply_ordermst.relid as purid,[table].remarks, msunit.msname,ranks.ranksname,[table].lineid as purmxid,wsp_supply_ordermst.ocode,fg_supplyfile.uicsendrate,[table].sendqty from [table] inner join wsp_supply_ordermst on wsp_supply_ordermst.orderid = [table].orderid inner join ec_purmst on wsp_supply_ordermst.relid = ec_purmst.purid inner join fg_supplyfile on fg_supplyfile.ocode = wsp_supply_ordermst.ocode and fg_supplyfile.compno = wsp_supply_ordermst.supcomp left join itemdata on [table].itemno = itemdata.itemno left join ranks on [table].ranks = ranks.ranks left join msunit on [table].msunit = msunit.msunit [where]

GetSendInfo.Sql: select wsp_supply_orderdtl.sendflg,wsp_supply_orderdtl.orderid,wsp_supply_orderdtl.lineid, wsp_supply_orderdtl.qty,wsp_supply_orderdtl.sendqty,fg_supplyfile.uicsendrate from wsp_supply_orderdtl inner join wsp_supply_ordermst on wsp_supply_orderdtl.orderid = wsp_supply_ordermst.orderid inner join fg_supplyfile on wsp_supply_ordermst.supcomp = fg_supplyfile.compno and wsp_supply_ordermst.ocode = fg_supplyfile.ocode [where]
